com.dermalog.android.embeddedbiometrics

Class EmbeddedBiometricsHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dermalog.android.embeddedbiometrics.EmbeddedBiometricsHandle

  • public final class EmbeddedBiometricsHandle
extends Object
    The EmbeddedBiometricsHandle holds an device instance for the EmbeddedBiometricsSDK.

      • scannerAutoCapture

        public void scannerAutoCapture(long timeout,
                               byte[] bih,
                               DEBCaptureInfo capInfo)
                        throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Auto capture a fingerprint. The capture process can be cancelled with scannerAutoCaptureCancel()
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout for the capture process in milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable timeout.
        bih - preallocated buffer (see DEBImageSize.getSizeBIH() )
        capInfo - object containing the capture information
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • scannerAutoCaptureCancel

        public void scannerAutoCaptureCancel()
                              throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Cancel auto capture. The execution of scannerAutoCapture(long, byte[], com.dermalog.android.embeddedbiometrics.DEBCaptureInfo) will be canceled and the flag DEBCaptureInfo.BIT_CANCELED will be set in DEBCaptureInfo This function will return immediately.
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • scannerCapture

        public void scannerCapture(byte[] bih,
                           DEBCaptureInfo capInfo)
                    throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Capture the current image without auto detection
        Parameters:
        bih - preallocated buffer (see DEBImageSize.getSizeBIH() )
        capInfo -
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • imageNISTQuality

        public int imageNISTQuality(byte[] bih)
                     throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Calculate the NIST quality of the given image
        Parameters:
        bih - Buffer containing a BITMAPINFOHEADER with image data
        Returns:
        the NIST quality of the Bitmap
        Throws:

      • templateExtract

        public byte[] templateExtract(byte[] bih,
                              int templateFormat)
                       throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Extract a template from the given image
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • templateExtract

        public byte[] templateExtract(byte[] bih,
                              int templateFormat,
                              int maxTemplateSize)
                       throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Extract a template from the given image an define a maximum template size.
        Parameters:
        bih - Buffer containing a BITMAPINFOHEADER with image data
        templateFormat - The format of the extracted template (see DEBTemplateFormat)
        maxTemplateSize - Maximum size of the extracted fingerprint template. Used for template size restrictions.
        Returns:
        Template data
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • templateVerify

        public double templateVerify(int templateFormatLeft,
                             byte[] templateLeft,
                             int templateFormatRight,
                             byte[] templateRight)
                      throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Verify two templates and return the matching score
        Parameters:
        templateFormatLeft - Format of the fingerprint template (see DEBTemplateFormat)
        templateLeft - Fingerprint template
        templateFormatRight - Format of the fingerprint template (see DEBTemplateFormat)
        templateRight - Fingerprint template
        Returns:
        Matching score between 0 and 100
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException

      • templateConvert

        public byte[] templateConvert(int templateFormatSource,
                              byte[] templateSource,
                              int templateFormatTarget,
                              int maxTemplateSize)
                       throws EmbeddedBiometricsException
        Convert template to a given template format
        Parameters:
        templateFormatSource - Format of the source fingerprint template (see DEBTemplateFormat)
        templateSource - Fingerprint source template
        templateFormatTarget - Format of the target fingerprint template (see DEBTemplateFormat)
        maxTemplateSize - Maximum size of the converted fingerprint template. Used for template size restrictions.
        Returns:
        Converted Template data
        Throws:
        EmbeddedBiometricsException
